title: Summoner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Final Words (Night): Choose a dead player. Receive any feedback from abilities used by or on that player on the night they died.
- Hopping Realms (Day, 1 use): Choose an alive player. Your target will receive all messages sent in dead chat for the remainder of the day, but will not be able to access the current day chat. Your target will regain access to the current day chat after the day ends.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, all dead Unseen members will be able to talk to the Unseen at night. Keep this attribute if you are converted to Assassin.
- If you were converted from Occultist, your spirit list from before your conversion will stay intact. You may choose any number of players to remove from your list, but you will not be able to add any more players. This does not count as an ability.

desc:
Post 1016
*...but I suspect they have something to do with the occult.*
